NAME 
NGUYEN VAN MINH 
ROLE 
Technical Leader/Technical Supporter/SA 
Overview 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
✓ Name  
NGUYEN VAN MINH 
✓ Nationality  
Vietnamese 
✓ Birth-Date  
01/08/1984 
✓ Gender  
Male 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
✓ Responsible, careful at work. 
✓ Can study new technology quickly. 
✓ Have strong experience in Microsoft technology (.Net framework, C# technologies and patterns). Good 
software design skills, object-oriented design. 
✓ Predilection for web programming, have good experience about web framework as jQuery, AngularJS, 
Angular. 
✓ Good ability to work in a team and independently. 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND 
✓ Hanoi Aptech Computer Education. 
✓ Degree/Qualifications: Higher Diploma in Software Engineering (HDSE course). 
LANGUAGES  
✓  Vietnamese 
✓  English 
Technical Skills 
Languages 
HTML5, CSS.  
XML 
JQuery, AngularJS, Angular 6+. 
C#.NET 
Databases 
NO SQL 
MYSQL, MS SQL Server 
Development and 
Design Tools 
✓ ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core, MVC, Web API. 
✓ Amazon Web Services (SNS, SQS, SES), RabbitMQ 
✓ Visual Studio 2015, 2017. 
✓ MS SQL Server. 
✓ Entity Framework 5.0, 6.0, LINQ, ADO.NET. 
✓ Tortoises SVN, Team Foundation Server, GIT. 
2 
Framework 
✓ .NET Framework 4.0+ 
✓ Angular 6+ 
OPERATING 
SYSTEMS  ✓  Windows.

Developer, Technical Leader/Technical Supporter, SA at FPT Software.

Replace current Med Advisor Pharmacry Console system by Electron framework.

100MM 
Position 
Technical Leader/Technical Supporter/SA 
Description 
Customer have KiSS4/KiSS4 system. That to help Switzerland local government help to 
manage/support citizens for social procedures.  
Old system was developed in WinForm & WPF technology. Now customer want to create 
modernize this on ASP.NET Core as Web API and Angular as front-end framework. 
Responsibility 
- 
Analysis old system, sorted out common module & controls to build shared 
components. 
3 
- 
Build a tool to generate structure of Angular Component based on WinForm custom 
control source code. It’s valuable for reducing team's effort and prevent human 
mistakes in iterator jobs. 
- 
Support Technical and Team Member.  
Technology 
- 
Angular 4+ (with NgRx/Redux for state management) 
- 
EF 6 
- 
ASP.NET Core (RESTful Web API with micro-service pattern) 
- 
MS SQL Server.

150MM

Technical Leader/SA

Description 
Reengineering the management system for small businesses. Main modules are    
Business Accounting, Human Resources, Warehouse Management, Wholesale and 
Retail.  
Shared access for external apps via Web API; from Desktop Application and Mobile 
App. 
Create background jobs for processing data and updating to DB with scheduled. 
Responsibility 
• 
Find solution to convert old app. 
• 
Build core project. 
• 
Support other team member.

SX-7000 project is a system about management of Shopping Center, helps for employees 
of plaza or shopping mall easy to manage bills, sales, depreciation expense with tenant 
(who is rent the space in plaza) and more other functions.

Planning & tracking tasks, weekly report to customer via email.

Develop social marketing site. This web site based on forms of social networking, it allows 
any shoppers can tracking trending products and share products from any online store; 
follow brands, categories or other people her like, organization product into collection list 
and share with other people on social or people her knows on Facebook.  
Fully integrated with Facebook platform (via Open Graph).

experiences.detail:
Description Build new project to replace the old application (was built on ASP Classic) with ASP.NET Core and MVC. Replace current Med Advisor Pharmacry Console system by Electron framework.
Maintaining and enhancing the existing OzDocsOnline system.
Responsibility - Build core project.
- Support technical and maintaining.
- Review code.
Technology - Amazon Web Service (EC2, SNS, SQS, SES) - ASPX, C# .Net - SQL Server.

Description Customer have KiSS4/KiSS4 system. That to help Switzerland local government help to manage/support citizens for social procedures.
Old system was developed in WinForm & WPF technology. Now customer want to create modernize this on ASP.NET Core as Web API and Angular as front-end framework.
Responsibility - Analysis old system, sorted out common module & controls to build shared components.
- Build a tool to generate structure of Angular Component based on WinForm custom control source code. It’s valuable for reducing team's effort and prevent human mistakes in iterator jobs.
- Support Technical and Team Member. Technology - Angular 4+ (with NgRx/Redux for state management)
- EF 6 - ASP.NET Core (RESTful Web API with micro-service pattern)
- MS SQL Server.

Project Description Reengineering the management system for small businesses. Main modules are
Business Accounting, Human Resources, Warehouse Management, Wholesale and
Retail. Shared access for external apps via Web API; from Desktop Application and Mobile App. Create background jobs for processing data and updating to DB with scheduled.
Responsibility • Find solution to convert old app.
• Build core project.
• Support other team member.
Technology • jQuery & AngularJS • ASP.NET Web API • EF 6 • MS SQL SERVER

Project Description An English Exam Test program, supports 4 kinds of exam in languages like Read, Write, Listen and Speaking. Responsibility Manage and tracking task in team.
Support technical for team member.
Technology • WPF, Net Framework 3.5 (app-base)
• PHP (web-base)
